question: Woman can do everything that men can and they even do it better. They also can do many thing that men cannot. But it is a fact that their work is not appropriated as much as men, although they have to sacrifice a lot to their family and career. What do you think?
text: İt is considered by some people that women can do everything that men can and they even do it better. They also can do many thing that men cannot. But it is a fact that their work is not appropriated as much as men, although they have to sacrifice a lot to their family and career.   I completely agree with the opinion and in my opinion ,  the job right should be provided to women by governments  ,  or seminars  can be given to companies by governments due to inequality among men and women .

Firstly ,  many companies generally prefer men for their job , and thus many women who have good education or good career can't work  in companies . İn my opinion ,  the job right should be provided such as  woman's takes place  in  companies to women by governments   .  Companies will acquire income in the best way if  women who have good education or good career will have the job right . For instance ,  a man can't do everthing but on the other hand companies generally give to only men the job right  , and thus a man who has not good education or good career doesn't be successfull in  his job .  Many women will provide income over  men who have not good education or good career  if companies will give to women the job right .

Secondly ,  unfortunately ,  although women have a good education or a good career  they  have to sacrifice a lot to their family and career   . Because companies generally prefer men . İn my opinion ,   many women won't need sacrifices a lot to their family and career if governments will set up seminars about job right or equality among men and women . For instance , the president of my city provided seminars about job right  for companies owners  who live in my city  , and thus companies owners were given information about the job right and inequality among men and women  , afterwards companies owners began to prefer  men and women  in an equal way  .

İn conclusion , in my opinion many  companies don't provide women the job right  in   the world of job , and thus it can certainly said that the number of men is more than women in the world of job  . Therefore  inequality  reveals  in between men and women in the world of job . This problem can be eliminated if governments will set up seminars about the job right  for company owners  or companies will provide to women the job right for income thanks to women who have good education or good career.
